ExampleDefinition.Title: Series Tooltips
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates using of Tooltip Modifier for getting information about Renderable Series and its displaying on tooltips.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Series Tooltips</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates using of Tooltip Modifier for getting information about Renderable Series and its displaying on tooltips.</Run>
